---
title: "alternative.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration data for a namespace named "alternative". It specifies a single flag named "Other Flag" associated with the key "otherflag".

## Code Structure
This file is a simple YAML configuration file and doesn't define any code symbols or logic. It simply structures data using key-value pairs.

## Symbols
This file does not define any code symbols. It is a data file in YAML format.

## Configuration
This YAML file defines configuration data with the following structure:

| Key | Description |
|:-----|:------------|
| `namespace` | Specifies the namespace as "alternative". |
| `flags` | A list of flags associated with this namespace. |
| `flags[].key` | The unique key for a flag within the namespace. |
| `flags[].name` | The human-readable name of the flag. |

In this specific instance, the file defines a single flag with the key "otherflag" and the name "Other Flag" within the "alternative" namespace.
